title: White manure
creator_credit: M. Bhavnani, Films Division, Government of India and Mohan Wadhwani
brief_description: Shows Sindri (India), which has the largest chemical fertilizer factory in Asia. The plan and the technical processes of the factory are shows, and tis significance for Indian agriculture is underlined.
